name: ashtech/nri-director
title: NRI Director
description: NRI support and concierge services section

description.default: Owning a home in India should be as effortless as living abroad. That's why we've designed an end-to-end support ecosystem for our global residents:

footerText.default:
We make your investment journey transparent, secure, and globally
accessible.

service1.default: Virtual tours and personalised consultations from anywhere in the world.

service2.default: Dedicated NRI relationship managers to guide you through every step.

service3.default: Complete digital documentation and registration for remote completion.

service4.default: Property management, leasing, and resale coordination via verified partners.

service5.default: Regular updates on construction, possession, and performance reports.
